content: On TSC just now we mentioned a FHIR-I call tomorrow at 5p ET. @FHIR-I Co-chairs can someone share background and a link here?
This is supposedly the "last meeting" in a FHIR-I series, but Rick and I haven't been following this
TSC has indicated they would like to be present at this meeting.
I think this might be related to #ig publishing requirements
I think you're right, and the TSC question is about the process governing changes like this

This was under discussion in several streams, I believe:
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/Publisher-impacting+Change+Process
